item.description:
Join the Boston Dyke March at The First New England Transgender Pride March and Rally!

The Boston Dyke March will be marching at TransPride! The Dyke March is proud to be part of this first annual event. Bring your signs, noisemakers, and voices and march with us while we support the trans and gender variant community! We'll also have an information table at the event, so come by and say hi. For more details and Lineup & Schedule go to: http://www.transpride....

When: June 7, 2008
Where: Northampton, MA
Time: March starts at 11:00am

THE MARCH: Starting at Bridge Street Elementary School!
THE RALLY: NEW LOCATION: Armory Street Parking Lot (Behind Thornes Marketplace)
item.how_to_find_us: The Dyke March is sponsoring at table and we will be marching with our banner
item.why: Let's support the trans and gender variant community at their first march and rally!!!!

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: Join the Boston Dyke March at The New England Transgender Pride March/Rally
